text: Iye ali ndi makiyi a zinthu zonse zobisika, palibe wina amene azidziwa koma Iye yekha. Iye amadziwa zonse zimene zili m’nthaka ndiponso m’nyanja; ndipo lisadagwe tsamba Iye amalidziwa. Palibe mbewu mu mdima wa nthaka kapena china chilichonse cha chiwisi kapena chouma koma zonsezo zidalembedwa mu Buku looneka bwino
